goal: I found a cool yurt near Joshua Tree National Park on StaynB. I want to book it for my anniversary, which is October 26th. Please check its availability for a 3-night stay starting that day. If it's free, set a reminder in my calendar for this Friday at noon to 'Book Joshua Tree Yurt - check payment'.
